english.segment1: quiet. seems like an honest world. you're begging for the baker's bread when the money's out. stand, climb, and fall. you carry the world. can't carry your hope
english.segment2: when the world is falling down. and another breaks. and another falls. for losers always make the winner's day
english.segment3: stand, climb, and fall. you carry the weight. can't carry it all
english.segment4: are you falling. are you faking. are you killing. are you breaking. am I burning. am I only melting. these diamonds in the making
english.segment5: when I'm at the end of myself. everything you want. when nothing seems to satisfy me. take anything you want
english.segment6: quiet. a sound you know so well. you're living just to make it through another day. stand, climb, and fall. you carry the world. can't carry your hope
english.segment7: are you falling. are you faking. are you killing. are you breaking. am I burning. am I only melting. these diamonds in the making
english.segment8: when I'm at the end of myself. everything you want. when nothing seems to satisfy me. take anything you want. take anything you want. take anything you want
